channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: Is Your Pixel Hiding Notifications on the Lock Screen? This Setting Is to Blame
item.dc:creator: Kabir Jain
item.content:encoded: When I set up my Pixel 10 for the first time, I was pretty happy with how smooth the process was. But then I hit something that didn’t feel right. My lock screen was only showing one notification in full, while the rest were shrunk down into a row of tiny app icons. This new compact style is part of Android 16 QPR1, which the Pixel 10 ships with by default, and it’s designed to keep things tidy.

item.title: Logitech's POP Smart Buttons Are Shutting Down
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: There's no open source way to save them either.
item.content:encoded: The era of Logitech’s popular smart home control solution, the POP button system, is abruptly coming to an end. Logitech has announced the complete discontinuation of the service, in some emails to customers, stating that it is effective October 15, 2025.

item.title: Why You Shouldn’t Count on Edge's Real-Time Video Translation Just Yet
item.dc:creator: Aman Kumar
item.description: A promising feature, but not without flaws.
item.content:encoded: The inability to understand the language used in a video shouldn't stop you from watching it. That's why Microsoft is testing a new AI audio translation feature in Edge that allows you to translate audio into your preferred language. However, as much as I want to love it, the feature isn't perfect and has a long way to go.

item.title: Arch Linux Is a Meme, but It Shouldn't Be
item.dc:creator: Graeme Peacock
item.description: Love it or loathe it, Arch Linux is undeniably a great distro, and the meme does that a disservice.
item.content:encoded: You've probably come across the Arch Linux memes, but are they doing it a disservice? Arch Linux is an excellent distribution, and I have five reasons why you should look past those labels and see for yourself.

item.title: Lexar's Magnetic Phone SSD Is Now Available
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Perfect for your MagSafe-compatible iPhone, or an Android phone with a magnetic case.
item.content:encoded: The Lexar ES5 Magnetic Portable SSD, which was first announced in July, is officially available to buy now. Lexar is clearly targeting Apple users with the ability to magnetically stick the SSD right to the back of any iPhone that supports MagSafe accessories.

item.title: This Hybrid SUV Is More Efficient Than the RAV4 and CR-V
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: A stylish hybrid SUV that beats the RAV4 and CR-V in fuel economy without sacrificing power or comfort.
item.content:encoded: In a segment dominated by familiar names, one hybrid SUV has quietly pulled ahead with efficiency that even the most popular models can’t match. Its blend of fuel savings, smooth performance, and everyday practicality makes it a standout choice for families and commuters alike.

item.title: This Tiny TP-Link Travel Router May Be Faster Than the One You Have at Home
item.dc:creator: Bertel King
item.description: Even routers don't need to be big anymore.
item.content:encoded: The TL-WR3002X AX3000 travel router is one of the fastest and most powerful models TP-Link currently offers, and it’s an easy device to recommend. If your living space is small, this, frankly, could even be the only router you need.

item.title: GIMP Photo Editor Gets More Bug Fixes Ahead of v3.2 Update
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: You don't have to wait until v3.2 for all these bug fixes.
item.content:encoded: The GIMP team has officially released the third micro-release for its stable branch, GIMP 3.0.6. While the team is hard at work on the much-anticipated GIMP 3.2, this new stable release was "really needed" because of how many bug fixes have accumulated.

item.title: Corsair Void V2 Wireless Gaming Headset Is 31% Off
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: This is a sweet deal on a great headset.
item.content:encoded: You can snag the Corsair Void V2 Wireless Gaming Headset for a surprisingly low price of just $90 on Amazon right now. This is a massive 31% discount off its regular $130 price tag, which is incredible when you think about the 70 hours of battery life this headset offers.

item.title: The Windows 11 25H2 Update Just Hit Another Milestone
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Windows 11 25H2 will be available to more people soon.
item.content:encoded: The long-awaited widespread availability of the Windows 11 2025 Update, officially known as version 25H2, is finally set to release. While Microsoft technically shipped the update on September 30, 2025, the rollout has taken a while, but this frustrating holding pattern will finally end.
